org.apache.jena.hadoop.rdf.io.registry

Interface ReaderFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractQuadsOnlyReaderFactory, AbstractReaderFactory, AbstractTriplesOnlyReaderFactory, JsonLDReaderFactory, NQuadsReaderFactory, NTriplesReaderFactory, RdfJsonReaderFactory, RdfXmlReaderFactory, ThriftReaderFactory, TriGReaderFactory, TriXReaderFactory, TurtleReaderFactory

    public interface ReaderFactory
    Interface for reader factories

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canReadQuads()
      Gets whether this factory can produce readers that are capable of reading quads
      boolean canReadTriples()
      Gets whether this factory can produce readers that are capable of reading triples
      org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.RecordReader<org.apache.hadoop.io.LongWritable,QuadWritable> createQuadReader()
      Creates a quad reader
      org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.RecordReader<org.apache.hadoop.io.LongWritable,TripleWritable> createTripleReader()
      Creates a triples reader
      Collection<Lang> getAlternativeLanguages()
      Gets the alternative languages this factory can produce readers for
      Lang getPrimaryLanguage()
      Gets the primary language this factory produces readers for

        Returns:

      • canReadQuads

        boolean canReadQuads()
        Gets whether this factory can produce readers that are capable of reading quads
        Returns:
        True if quads can be read, false if not

      • canReadTriples

        boolean canReadTriples()
        Gets whether this factory can produce readers that are capable of reading triples
        Returns:
        True if triples can be read, false if not

      • createQuadReader

        org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.RecordReader<org.apache.hadoop.io.LongWritable,QuadWritable> createQuadReader()
                                                                                                   throws IOException
        Creates a quad reader
        Returns:
        Quad reader
        Throws:
        IOException - May be thrown if a quad reader cannot be created

                                                                                                       throws IOException
        Creates a triples reader
        Returns:
        Triples reader
        Throws:
        IOException - May be thrown if a triple reader cannot be created
